name: 要有光-Let There Be Light
description: Let There Be Light is an audio combat game without any visual design elements. It’s inspired by classic Chanbara films and attempts to create intensive combat experience through samurai-like duels. It makes full use of the blindness feature and designed silence to accumulate player’s tension, while releasing the emotion through quick-time combat system including Slash, Parry, Initiative, Enchantment and so on.
